programme.title: Love Me

programme.desc: As life and love start to flourish for Glen, Clara and Aaron, they're each momentarily jolted back a step to reconsider their choices.

programme.desc: With Aaron soon to be a father and Glen happily living with his new wife Anita, Clara and Peter decide they want to start a family.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In the first heat, eight artists use oils, inks and raw eggs to tackle Plymouth's landmark lighthouse Smeaton's Tower, all hoping to impress judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this second heat, eight artists take on the surreal sci-fi landscape of East Sussex's Herstmonceux Observatory in a bid to impress judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan, and Kathleen Soriano.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this third heat, eight artists set up their easels on the banks of the River Tyne to create an artwork of the engineering marvel that is the Gateshead Millennium Bridge.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Eight artists are taking on the splendour of the Sussex's medieval Herstmonceux Castle, hoping to create an artwork that catches the eye of judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this heat, eight artists head to Tyneside to capture its industrial heritage in an artwork that will impress judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano. The winning artist goes to the semifinal.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Eight artists are challenged to create a seascape of Plymouth Sound and its beguiling Drake's Island. They must impress judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan, and Kathleen Soriano if they want to win.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Six semifinalists have been chosen by judges Tai-Shan Schierenberg, Kate Bryan and Kathleen Soriano, and now they must paint the otherworldly view of dormant oil rigs that dominate the horizon.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Hundreds of artists from all over the UK and Ireland have battled with brushes, rollers, paints and pencils for just three places in the final. As the sun sets, our three finalists face their toughest challenge yet.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: To celebrate the bicentenary of the birth of John Ruskin, our winning artist will visit some of this Victorian art critic's most-loved Venetian architectural icons, to photograph, sketch and take inspiration.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan hosts *Landscape Artist of the Year*, where 8 artists compete at Hampton Court for a 10k commission and a semi-final spot, with Wildcards hoping for a chance to join the race.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Eight artists compete on Mount Snowdon for a $10,000 commission and a semi-final spot, with 50 wildcards hoping for a chance to join the race.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan returns for *Landscape Artist of the Year* in Bristol, where artists compete on a terrace overlooking the Clifton Suspension Bridge, vying for a semi-final spot.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Join Stephen Mangan in the fourth heat at St Pancras Basin, where eight artists compete by the canal, overlooking the busy train lines to King's Cross and St Pancras.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In North Wales, eight artists compete in front of a historic slate quarry in the fifth heat.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan returns for the final heat in Bristol, where eight artists compete along the bustling harbourside for a 10,000 pounds commission and a semifinal spot.

programme.desc: Stephen Mangan presents the semi final at Portsmouth Historic Dockyard.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan hosts the grand finale of the series.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Stephen Mangan and Joan Bakewell search for Britain's best landscape artist. In this first heat, they're off to the seaside town of Blackpool.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: This second heat, eight artists are dressed in their finery at Royal Ascot, alongside presenters Joan Bakewell and Stephen Mangan, and judges Kate Bryan, Kathleen Soriano and Tai Shan Schierenberg.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: In this third heat, they're off to Castle Ward in Northern Ireland, where eight artists are faced with the gothic facade of this historic mansion.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The contestants are hoping to create work that catches the eye of judges at the famous roller-coasters of Blackpool Pleasure Beach.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.sub-title: Royal Ascot Royal Enclosure Car Park
programme.desc: Artists are charged with capturing the glamorous racegoers at the Royal Enclosure Picnic.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: Artists are lined up along a stone jetty on the picturesque shores of Strangford Lough in County Down, Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year
programme.desc: The winners of all six heats, together with the winner of the wildcard competition, are lined up along the bank of the river to try and capture this miracle of modern engineering.

programme.title: Landscape Artist of the Year

programme.desc: Mariette has agreed to stay for the summer and with the arrival of Charley and Tom Fisher, her heart is being pulled in many directions.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Alphy and Geordie's investigation into the murder of an archaeologist uncovers a web of betrayal and deceit.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A young man is found dead with heroin in his blood and a stolen credit card in his wallet. But only when Vera learns details of his mother's life does a motive for murder emerge.

programme.title: Ripper Street
programme.desc: Reid, on the run from the police, must find a way to bring down Assistant Commissioner Augustus Dove.

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Just six weeks until the wedding, nerves and excitement kick in. Gavin has an important question while Nessa is having uncharacteristic doubts.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: When a Chinese businessman with a map to a long-lost silver mine is found dead in Chinatown, Poirot must find the map and killer.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: During a snowstorm in Dartmoor, hotel guests hold a seance for fun, but events turn dark when the table warns that a local is in danger.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Alphy and Geordie's investigation into the murder of an archaeologist uncovers a web of betrayal and deceit.

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The house of a respected, long-dead botanist becomes sought after because it's believed to contain seeds of a now-extinct plant that may offer a cure for malaria.

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: It's Gavin and Stacey's respective buck and hen nights. Nessa and Stacey are hiding big secrets, but will Gavin ever discover Stacey's secret past?

programme.title: Whitstable Pearl
programme.desc: When a retired policeman is murdered during a Civil War re-enactment, McGuire initially focuses on widow Heidi.

programme.title: Funny Woman
programme.desc: Sophie is the nation's favourite TV comedy star, has a group of good friends and her romance with Dennis is full of promise. But trouble is just round the corner.

programme.title: The Royals Revealed
programme.desc: Only a handful of royal retainers are ever granted access to the inner circle.

programme.title: The Saturday Five

programme.desc: Join our provocative panel to discuss and debate the spikiest stories and craziest controversies of the week.

programme.title: Alex Armstrong Tonight

programme.title: Dante's Peak
programme.desc: Without warning day becomes night, air turns to fire and the ground runs with molten terror. This is a spectacular volcano disaster movie with heart-pounding suspense.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Russian submarine commander attempts to defect to the US, bringing both sides to the brink of war.

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: An expert rafter takes her family for a day out on the river. But when two bank robbers hijack their raft, it turns into a white-water knuckle-biter.

programme.title: Bird on a Wire
programme.desc: Hiding under the FBI witness protection program, a man gets nervous when an old flame recognises him. The two then find themselves thrown together on an exhilarating, cross-country odyssey.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: An FBI director works with a Russian agent and a jailed terrorist to hunt down the elusive Jackal, a master-of-disguise assassin on a deadly mission.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A man is labelled an 'In-Valid' because he was conceived not in the lab, but in love, in a future where 'designer people', forged in test tubes, rule society.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A slick, young Navy lawyer is assigned to investigate a murder case in which two Marines killed a fellow enlisted man, and no one's talking.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: Teenage Charley Brewster is a horror-film junkie, so it's no surprise that when a reclusive new neighbor moves next-door, Brewster becomes convinced he's a vampire.

programme.title: The River Wild
programme.desc: An expert rafter takes her family for a day out on the river. But when two bank robbers hijack their raft, it turns into a white-water knuckle-biter.

programme.title: Bird on a Wire
programme.desc: Hiding under the FBI witness protection program, a man gets nervous when an old flame recognises him. The two then find themselves thrown together on an exhilarating, cross-country odyssey.

programme.title: The Jackal
programme.desc: An FBI director works with a Russian agent and a jailed terrorist to hunt down the elusive Jackal, a master-of-disguise assassin on a deadly mission.

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: A man is labelled an 'In-Valid' because he was conceived not in the lab, but in love, in a future where 'designer people', forged in test tubes, rule society.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: A slick, young Navy lawyer is assigned to investigate a murder case in which two Marines killed a fellow enlisted man, and no one's talking.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: Teenage Charley Brewster is a horror-film junkie, so it's no surprise that when a reclusive new neighbor moves next-door, Brewster becomes convinced he's a vampire.

programme.title: Footloose (1984)
programme.desc: In this beloved classic, a Chicago teen ends up in a town where dancing is banned by the local preacher. He then teams up with the preacher's daughter and gets everyone dancin'.

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: When the sons of a cavalry colonel set out to fight a war in Europe, suspicion and jealousy threaten to tear apart their once indestructible bond when the sexy Susanna enters their lives.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: A story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor. Two wealthy power players set the wheels turning with a crazy bet and the comedy gets richer by the minute.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty, a typical teen, is accidentally sent back to 1955 in a plutonium-powered time machine. Marty must make sure his teenage parents-to-be meet and fall in love so he can get back to the future.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: An ultra-cool, fresh out of Detroit, foul-mouthed detective is treading on toes in Beverly Hills as he zeroes in on the scum who killed his friend.

programme.title: The Meaning of Life
programme.desc: The Monty Python team tackle this weighty subject in a series of sketches involving body parts, religion, the wonders of war, the miracle of birth, and a preview of what awaits in heaven.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The orphanage where Jake and Elwood were raised will be sold unless the tax on the property is paid within days. The brothers decide to raise the money by putting their band back together.

programme.desc: Wealthy hunters pay for the right to stalk and kill the most challenging prey of them all: man.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to mud. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #3 I'm from Vietnam. / Learn how to say where you're from. The formula is the name of the place, followed by "kara kimashita".

programme.title: Tokyo's Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40% of Tokyo's Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: A week into the new year, giant torches are lit in a shrine precinct. The shadows they create enable a demon-oni-to go to a river and cleanse people of troubles. This is Oniyo: the night of the oni.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Nishino Masatoshi didn't know what he wanted to do with his life until he learned about horse logging. Now, he's chasing his dream in the forests of Hokkaido with the help of his trusty sidekick, Kap.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Diary
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: YONEZAWA
programme.desc: A 700-year-old hot spring, Shirabu Onsen, is maintained via daily trips up the slopes of the 2,000-meter mountain where it sits. See the hot spring's guardian at work, in gorgeous time-lapse footage.

programme.title: Journeys in Japan

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make su-no-mono with dried daikon radish. Just mix rehydrated daikon with red radish and sweet vinegar, and this tasty pink-colored dish is ready to serve.

programme.title: Documentary 360
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship documentary series offers must-see episodes on politics, the economy, social trends, science and the environment in Japan and beyond.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Do the Oceans Hold the Key?
programme.desc: The World Expo 2025 is underway in Osaka, Japan. Bobby Judo and a hydrologist visit pavilions focusing on climate change to find out how the ocean can help us combat this urgent global issue.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Train Cruise
programme.desc: We travel the JR Hakushin and Uetsu Lines of Niigata and Yamagata in search of traditional food culture in a major rice-producing region: sampling sake, fine salmon dishes and other culinary delights.

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japan now has roughly 8.5 million vacant homes. We look at various initiatives that aim to address this issue, including renovating homes as investments or using them to revitalize local communities.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Lighting Everyday Life. From a design to add light to an enclosed lot, cozy lamps with a dim glow, to a project for those with light sensitivities. Explore an array of lighting designs.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy MATH
programme.desc: Numbler erases a part of a cake delivery memo, resulting in the delivery of four cakes instead of one. Barky solves the mystery by showing the difference between ordinal numbers and cardinal numbers.

programme.title: Take Tech
programme.desc: A program for upper primary to lower secondary school children to explore the everyday technologies all around them. Each episode takes a piece of familiar tech to find out what it does and how.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Yokai
programme.desc: The fox, or KITSUNE also holds an identity as a supernatural creature commonly depicted at shrines, known for its ability to masquerade as humans to deceive them, or to provide divine messages.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to Go. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ethical Every Day
programme.desc: Climate change continues, and heat is affecting crops. Some Japanese farmers are adjusting to compensate, like a citrus farmer growing subtropical fruits and a farm that generates solar power.

programme.title: BOSAI
programme.desc: A large-scale blackout is the total loss of power in an entire region. Hokkaido's 2018 blackout had a major impact on medical care and logistics. Find out the mechanisms and how it can be prevented.

programme.title: Pottery the Times Demand
programme.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighbourhood of identical houses.

programme.title: The Science of Sleep
programme.desc: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: An enthusiastic young adventurer follows his dreams into the Amazon jungle with two friends and a guide with a mysterious past.

programme.title: Under The Silver Lake
programme.desc: Sam, a disenchanted 33-year-old finds a mysterious woman in his apartment's pool. When she vanishes, he embarks on a quest across LA, leading him down a path of mystery.

programme.title: Pusher
programme.desc: A failed drug deal lands Frank in debt to a ruthless and dangerous Copenhagen drug lord.

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A SWAT team is trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs. Stranded on the sixth floor, they must fight their way through the city's worst to survive.

programme.title: Sympathy For The Devil
programme.desc: After being forced to drive a mysterious passenger at gunpoint, a man finds himself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse where it becomes clear that not everything is as it seems.

programme.title: Psycho Goreman
programme.desc: In this light-hearted yet violent cosmic, comedy adventure, an intergalactic warlord becomes enslaved to a pair of Earth children after they unwittingly resurrect him.

programme.title: Hellraiser IV: Bloodline
programme.desc: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

programme.title: The Fall
programme.desc: A bedridden stuntman entrances a little girl with tales of exotic heroes. As his health reaches the point of peril so does the story he's telling, with dramatic consequences. An epic fantasy.

programme.title: Corrective Measures
programme.desc: When a powerless new inmate arrives at a prison for supervillains, he must choose his friends wisely, or become a pawn in the deadly game between the Warden and The Lobe.

programme.title: Wrong Place
programme.desc: A meth cook hunts down the former police chief in order to silence him before he can deliver eyewitness testimony against his family.

programme.title: Top Knot Detective
programme.desc: Takashi Takamoto begins writing jingles for a well-known Japanese company and ends up creating a bloody series of samurai action that, over time, becomes a cult series.

programme.title: Super Mario Bros.
programme.desc: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: Two New Orleans paramedics' lives are ripped apart after they encounter a series of horrific deaths linked to a designer drug with bizarre, other-worldly effects.

programme.title: Oasis
programme.desc: An irresponsible and childish ex-con befriends a girl with cerebral palsy and develops a progressively stronger bond with her.

programme.title: Color Out Of Space
programme.desc: A family's retreat to rural life quickly crumbles when a meteorite crashes into their front yard. They attempt to battle a nebulous entity that they can barely understand.

programme.title: The Chaser
programme.desc: A cop investigates the disappearance of several call girls he pimps out.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: A story told both forwards and backwards in time about an ex- insurance investigator, unable to remember new thoughts, who uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

programme.title: Black Robe
programme.desc: In 1634 a Jesuit missionary sets out to convert the tribes in Huron Indian country. A culture-clashing masterpiece from Australian director Bruce Beresford.

programme.title: Lords of Chaos
programme.desc: The origins of Norwegian Black Metal and a group of young men with a flair for publicity, church-burning and murder.

programme.title: Sound of Silence
programme.desc: Emma must uncover the dark secret behind a cursed radio to survive and protect her family.

programme.title: Puppet Master
programme.desc: After being contacted by their mysterious former colleague, four psychics arrive at a secluded hotel where they are stalked by a group of murderous puppets.

programme.title: Puppet Master II
programme.desc: The malicious marionettes are back to resurrect their dead master and evict parapsychologists from the family estate.

programme.title: Dobermann
programme.desc: The Dobermann and his gang have been hitting the headlines. Banks, post-offices, bullion vans! The whole works! An anthology of robbery, a compilation of hold-ups!

programme.title: Black Death
programme.desc: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset
programme.desc: In the misty forests of North America, a family of Sasquatches find themselves on a collision course with the ever-changing world around them.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Detective Joe Kozenczak (Michael Riley) tracks down John Wayne Gacy (Brian Dennehy), convicted in 1980 of 33 Chicago serial killings.

programme.title: Joint Security Area
programme.desc: After a shooting incident at the North-South Korean border DMZ leaves two North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss and Swedish team investigates what actually happened.

programme.title: A Bittersweet Life
programme.desc: A gangster (Lee Byung-hun) starts a violent feud after he refuses to kill his boss's (Kim Yeong-cheol) cheating girlfriend.

programme.title: Dark Diamond
programme.desc: After his father's death, a man vows vengeance against the relatives who abandoned him.

programme.title: God is a Bullet
programme.desc: After his ex-wife is murdered and his daughter is kidnapped, Bob Hightower, infiltrates the group to hunt down their leader with the help of the cult's only female victim escapee.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Chen Wing Yan, a young police officer, has been sent undercover as a mole in the local mafia. Lau Kin Ming, a young mafia member, infiltrates the police force.

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: A father and son, both coroners, are pulled into a complex mystery while attempting to identify the body of a young woman.

programme.title: Sator
programme.desc: Secluded in a desolate forest, a broken family is observed by the demon Sator who is attempting to claim them.

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: Teenagers are tortured, chopped up and impaled on meat hooks by a demented backwards family. This grisly 1974 blood-curdler ranks with Psycho and Halloween as a landmark in the horror/slasher genre.

programme.title: Noroi: The Curse
programme.desc: A paranormal journalist named Kobayashi goes missing shortly after completing a documentary. What begins as an investigation into strange noises soon evolves into the chilling mystery of a demonic entity.

programme.title: The House That Jack Built
programme.desc: USA in the 1970s. We follow the highly intelligent Jack over a span of 12 years and are introduced to the murders that define his development as a serial killer.

programme.title: Quest for Fire
programme.desc: A prehistoric Cro-Magnon tribe depends on an ever-burning source of fire, which eventually extinguishes. Lacking the knowledge of how to start a new one, the tribe sends three warriors on a quest.

programme.title: The Paper Tigers
programme.desc: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.

programme.title: The Stunt man
programme.desc: A fugitive stumbles onto a movie set just when they need a new stunt man, takes the job as a way to hide out and falls for the leading lady while facing off with his manipulative director.

programme.title: The Hit
programme.desc: A hit man is sent to Spain to kidnap an ex-criminal and transport him to Paris for execution.

programme.title: What Lies Below
programme.desc: A 16-year-old girl returns home from camp and learns her mother has a new boyfriend, one she intends to marry; a man whose charm, intelligence and beauty make him look like he's not human at all.

programme.title: The Wild Goose Lake
programme.desc: On the run, gangster Zhou connects with sex worker Liu Aiai who was instructed to bring him in.

programme.title: The Parts You Lose
programme.desc: A young boy in a small North Dakota town befriends a potentially dangerous fugitive.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: The radiation from a fallen satellite causes the recently deceased to rise from the grave and seek the living to use as food.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: The flesh-eating undead have wiped out every last vestige of the civilised world. Deep underground, a group of scientists and soldiers work to find a cure for the unstoppable plague.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: As the seconds tick down to midnight, an ex-con becomes a reluctant hero trapped by a masked "Collector" in a maze of lethal invention while trying to rescue the very family he came to rob.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: When pregnant Ellie returns to her childhood home to complete a book, she's reunited with her mother. Consumed by dark memories of the house, she ends up unearthing a horrifying reality.

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: Late one night on a country road, Tun and Jane accidentally run over a mysterious pedestrian. Fleeing the scene, they return to their lives in Bangkok, but soon discover things have changed.

programme.title: House of the Devil
programme.desc: Financially struggling college student Samantha takes a strange babysitting job that coincides with a full lunar eclipse. She slowly realizes her clients harbor a terrifying secret.

programme.title: Lars and the Real Girl
programme.desc: Lars is content with his artificial girlfriend: a life-sized doll named Bianca. When he develops feelings for an attractive co-worker, Lars finds himself lost in a unique love triangle.

programme.title: I Kill Giants
programme.desc: The story of a teenager who struggles through school and family life by escaping into a fantasy world of magic and monsters.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: From their base in the city sewers, turtle heroes Michelangelo, Raphael, Leonardo and Donatello are on a mission to defeat an evil warlord and wipe out crime.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Paranoia drives this hi-tech cyber thriller when a computer programmer who turns to corporate espionage is caught in a spiral where even his own identity is put in doubt.

programme.title: Hellbound: Hellraiser II
programme.desc: Kristy Cotton is in a psychiatric hospital reliving the hellish events pertaining to a certain puzzle box that contains deadly spirits.

programme.title: Vivarium
programme.desc: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighbourhood of identical houses.

programme.title: Apex
programme.desc: A group of elite hunters pay to hunt down a man on a deserted island, only to find themselves becoming the prey.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a travelling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Hell House LLC
programme.desc: Five years after 15 people were killed during a haunted house tour, a documentary crew visits the scene to investigate what really happened.

programme.title: Terrifier
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Tara Heyes finds herself as the obsession of a sadistic murderer known as Art the Clown.

programme.title: Terrifier 2
programme.desc: Resurrected by a sinister entity, Art the Clown returns to Miles County to terrorise a teenage girl and her younger brother on Halloween night.

programme.title: Demonic Toys
programme.desc: Two gunrunners and a pregnant policewoman (Tracy Scoggins) are trapped in a warehouse with a bad boy's toys.

programme.title: Demonic Toys: Personal Demons
programme.desc: A group of people on a world wide search for oddities find themselves trapped in a nine hundred year old Italian castle when they accidently unleash the Demonic Toys.

programme.title: Eyes Without a Face
programme.desc: A surgeon causes a car accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

programme.title: Heathers
programme.desc: Veronica meets a James Dean-type newcomer who suggests they kill off the popular kids and end the cruel, unfair treatment the girls impose on unpopular kids at school.

programme.title: Judge Judy
programme.desc: A former New York family court judge, Judge Judy acts as a true moral compass for people seeking guidance, resolution and a little common sense.
